title: Find Zevlor
content:
He can join you in Act 3 in quest Gather Your Allies.

How to unlock Find Zevlor

Cerys / Last Light Inn

Find Zevlor Rewards

Zevlor ally in Gather Your Allies

Find Zevlor Notes & Tips

Notes & tips go here
